summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-eighth Avenue, from East Spruce Street to East Cherry Street, all in the City of Seattle, by laying water mains of proper dimensions, together with all gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 425 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," under the provisions of Ordinance No. 5693 of said city, approval December 6, 1899. ..-VOTE:
